text: Ken Herbert (27 December 1924 – 3 March 2011) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:2011 deaths Category:1924 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Sturt Football Club players Category:Australian military personnel of World War II
title: Ken Herbert
